duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver proactive consultive services including educational workshops and expert guidance.
Train customers and share industry and development expertise.
Participate in a thriving developer community to improve customer experience and software development goals.
Build strong customer relationships and ensure deliveries align with customer projects and milestones.
Maintain and extend accreditations, certifications, and develop best practices for key technologies and products.

Provide enterprise-level support and administration focused on Power BI, SQL performance and tuning optimization, core SQL + migration on-prem and cloud, Azure data lake, Azure data factory, and Synapse.
Solve performance problems, query tuning, and optimization for all versions of SQL Server.
Deliver and/or author technical training for SQL Server Integration Services, Reporting Services, and Analysis Services.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
